mapper.insert: insert into tbl_recipeboard(mno, bno, ino, title, content, materialContent) values (#{mno}, seq_bno.nextval, #{ino}, #{title , jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content , jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{materialContent , jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select * from tbl_recipeBoard where bno = #{bno, jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.update: update tbl_recipeboard set mno = #{mno}, title = #{title}, ino = #{ino}, content = #{content}, materialcontent = #{materialContent}, updatedate = sysdate where bno = #{bno}
